name: Soul of Sword
description:
No In-App-Purchase. "Soul of Sword" is a 2D Action RPG game. Hope you like.:)


Long long ago there were monsters everywhere. A taoist made a sword. He killed a lot of monsters. The world was finally restored to tranquility. But peace is always. Evil revived. The Monster King brought death and chaos. A young hero must pursue the Monster King to avenge his parents.

(Thanks Judy)
